text: @StephenCurry30 @NIAIDNews If someone is aasymptomatic carrier of Coronavirus, how would you know for sure, how long that person can be contagious?  They say incubation period is 2 weeks but everyone’s health condition is different, so how can you be sure? #SCASKSFAUCI
